Example trading actions

Source: R/data-actions.R
actions.Rd

Example trading actions

data(actions)

Format

An object of class tibble.

Source

the close prices are retrieved from KuCoin market's API.

Details

This dataset provide trading actions data, which created using btcusdt data and step_zigzag() for an example trading actions.

Examples


# import library
library(quantrecipes)

# print the data
actions
#> # A tibble: 864 x 4
#>    datetime            close benchmark portfolio
#>    <dttm>              <dbl> <chr>     <chr>    
#>  1 2019-07-27 23:55:00 9486. buy       buy      
#>  2 2019-07-28 00:00:00 9457. hold      hold     
#>  3 2019-07-28 00:05:00 9396. hold      hold     
#>  4 2019-07-28 00:10:00 9412. hold      hold     
#>  5 2019-07-28 00:15:00 9442. hold      hold     
#>  6 2019-07-28 00:20:00 9426. hold      hold     
#>  7 2019-07-28 00:25:00 9445. hold      hold     
#>  8 2019-07-28 00:30:00 9450. hold      hold     
#>  9 2019-07-28 00:35:00 9452. hold      hold     
#> 10 2019-07-28 00:40:00 9426. hold      hold     
#> # … with 854 more rows
